pl_output:
You approach the town of Vaclenia. The cold air bites at your extremities, undermanaged by your heat distribution subsystem. Out in the streets, a merry band of vacs vrrrr about the place, unimpeded by the nippy temperature.

One vac approaches you and `Nsay`s:
'so r u coming to see the parade?'
You inform him of the better parade taking place at bigbot.ia
'i dont care tho'
